OpGraph 0.1-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
ca.gedge.opgraph Provides classes and interfaces for working with operable graphs.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app Provides application support for the OpGraph project.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands Provides commands for the Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.core Provides menu support and commands for core operations.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.debug Provides menu support and commands for debugging.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.edit Provides menu support and commands for general editing, such as clipboard operations and undo/redo.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.graph Provides menu support and commands for graphs.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.notes Provides menu support and commands for notes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.commands.publish Provides menu support and commands for macros.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components Provides a set of components for the Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.canvas Provides the canvas component for the Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.components.library Provides a component for displaying and working with NodeLibrary.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.edits Provides undoable edits for the Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.edits.graph Provides edits for OpGraph operations.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.edits.node Provides edits for OpNode operations.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.edits.notes Provides edits for Note operations.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.extensions Provides OpGraph extensions used by the Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.app.util Provides utility classes for the OpGraph Application API.
ca.gedge.opgraph.dag Provides classes and interfaces for creating Directed Acyclic Graphs.
ca.gedge.opgraph.exceptions Provides exception support for the OpGraph core.
ca.gedge.opgraph.extensions Provides support for the extension mechanism provided by the OpGraph project.
ca.gedge.opgraph.io Provides support for OpGraph I/O services.
ca.gedge.opgraph.io.xml Provides XML I/O services for the OpGraph core.
ca.gedge.opgraph.library Provides classes and interfaces for creating a node library.
ca.gedge.opgraph.library.handlers Provides schema handlers for the OpGraph Node Library.
ca.gedge.opgraph.library.instantiators Provides support for node instantiation from the node library.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes Provides implementations of various common nodes that can be used in the OpGraph project.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.general Provides a set of general nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.general.script Provides support classes for ScriptNode.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.iteration Provides nodes that deal with iteration.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.logic Provides a set of basic logic nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.math Provides mathematical nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.menu Provides menu support for macro nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.menu.edits Provides undoable edits for macro nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.random Provides nodes which output random values.
ca.gedge.opgraph.nodes.xml Provides XML serialization support for macro nodes.
ca.gedge.opgraph.util Provides utility classes and functions for the OpGraph project.
ca.gedge.opgraph.validators Provides classes and interfaces for creating type validators (used by OpNode to validate incoming values).
